course_description: This course is a continuation of Math 411 which focuses on integration and uniform convergence in n-space.  Topics include: Stoke's theorem, Fubini's theorem, Taylor's theorem, the Stone-Weierstrass theorem, and Sard's theorem.
prerequisites: This course requires MATH 411 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
schedule_location: MW 8:30am-9:45am in Math & Science Center - W303
